NAEB RADIO NETWORK
34
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: FOREIGN AFFAIRS
Type: Lecture
Time: 59:30
No,: 5 programs
Origin: Cooper Union-WNYC
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 57-30
Release Date: Issue 22 (June 2)
Program 1 - Issue 22
’’Background for Peace: Geography and People of Asia” - Johnson E. Fairchild,
Geographer; Director of the Division of Adult Education, The Cooper Union.
Program 2 - Issue 23
’’Recent Events in the U.S.S.R.” - Rabbi Morris N, Kertzer, World Traveller; Educator
Writer.
Program 3 - Issue 24
’’India's Foreign Policy” - Hon. V. K. Krishna Msnon, Head of the Indian Delegation
to the United Nations. (Note: In the event that this speaker cannot talk due to
urgent business, another member of the Indian Delegation will speak.)
Program 4 - Issue 25
’’Germany and Central Europe” - Eric Mann, World Traveller and Author.
Program 5 - Issue 26
’’Conflict in the Near East” - Cyrus H. Gordon, Archaeologist and Author,
